thread.title: Mercedes Wants to Borrow Money From You. Should You Bite?

author: Jason Zweig
title: Mercedes Wants to Borrow Money From You. Should You Bite?
text: This spring, tens of thousands of people who own or lease a Mercedes-Benz vehicle are receiving an unusual direct-mail offer: an invitation to invest in short-term securities from Mercedes paying a 2.5% annual rate. That looks like a limousine of yield alongside the jalopy rates of less than 1% you get right now on most Brexit & Beyond: Europe Bristles at Quota Comeback Next WSJ City PM: How Iranian Oil Squeeze Could Upset OPEC Deal, Barclays CEO Fined, Silverlake's Â£2.2 Billion Property Play
